privacyIntro: Protecting your personal data is important to us. Your data is processed exclusively on the basis of legal regulations (GDPR, TKG 2003).
privacyContact: If you contact us via form or email, your data will be stored for the purpose of processing the request. We do not share this data without your consent.
privacyCookies: Our website uses cookies to provide a user-friendly experience.
privacyRights: You have the right to access, correct, delete or object to the processing of your data. Please contact the relevant data protection authority for complaints.
